name: The Keep is Alive
description:
You're one of the last Sentient Castles. Just a young Keep, you have no choice but to flee the incoming horde of barbarians.

Seek and find friendly villages, navigate through obstacles, acquire new elements for your keep, and grow enough to scare off your enemies.

Download the game for better performances

Controls:
WASD, arrows or gamepad to move the Keep

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46

Changelog

  • 21/04/2020: Added webgl port of the original game
